page.title: 05THE JEWISH SABBATH 3
page.content:
After the meal you are allowed to learn the Torah, the name of the Jewish book of God, or you may go to sleep for the night. On Shabbos Jewish people may not do any work, this includes turning on the electric light, television or driving cars and other such things. This means they must go up to a dark bedroom when they go to bed.
In the morning, Saturday, when you get up you wash your hands and then get ready to go to the synagogue in your best clothes. According to a custom Jewish people are not permitted to eat before prayers. On Shabbos morning, at Synagogue different prayers are said.
